00031 // NOTE: If this is defined, the normal vertex query functions
00032 //       will not return mid-nodes.
00033 #undef SEPARATE_MID_NODES

00037 const std::vector<size_t> dummy_list;
00038 const Vector3D dummy_vtx;
00039 
00040 size_t MeshImplData::num_vertices() const 
00041 {
00042   size_t count = 0;
00043   for (std::vector<Vertex>::const_iterator iter = vertexList.begin();
00044        iter != vertexList.end(); ++iter)
00045 #ifdef SEPARATE_MID_NODES
00046     if (iter->valid && iter->midcount < iter->adjacencies.size())
00047 #else
00048     if (iter->valid)
00049 #endif
00050       ++count;
00051   return count;
00052 }
00053 
00054 size_t MeshImplData::num_elements() const
00055   { return elementList.size() - deletedElementList.size(); }
00056 
00057 size_t MeshImplData::num_vertex_uses() const
00058 {
00059   size_t result = 0;
00060   for (std::vector<Element>::const_iterator iter = elementList.begin();
00061        iter != elementList.end(); ++iter)
00062   {
00063 #ifdef SEPARATE_MID_NODES
00064     unsigned from_topo = TopologyInfo::corners( iter->topology );
00065     result += from_topo ? from_topo : iter->connectivity.size();
00066 #else
00067     result += iter->connectivity.size();
00068 #endif
00069   }
00070   return result;
00071 }

00073 const Vector3D& MeshImplData::get_vertex_coords( size_t index, MsqError& err ) const
00074 {
00075   if (!is_vertex_valid( index ))
00076   {
00077     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid vertex handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00078     return dummy_vtx;
00079   }
00080   
00081   return vertexList[index].coords;
00082 }

00095 bool MeshImplData::vertex_is_slaved( size_t index, MsqError& err ) const
00096 {
00097   if (!is_vertex_valid( index ))
00098   {
00099     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid vertex handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00100     return false;
00101   }
00102   if (!have_slaved_flags())
00103   {
00104     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Slave flags not set", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00105     return false;
00106   }
00107   
00108   return vertexList[index].slaved;
00109 }

00157 EntityTopology MeshImplData::element_topology( size_t index, MsqError& err ) const
00158 {
00159   if (!is_element_valid( index ))
00160   {
00161     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);

00167 
00168 void MeshImplData::element_topology( size_t index, EntityTopology type, MsqError& err )
00169 {
00170   if (!is_element_valid( index ))
00171   {
00172     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00173     return ;
00174   }
00175   
00176   unsigned i, numvert;
00177   
00178   numvert = TopologyInfo::corners( elementList[index].topology );
00179   if (numvert) 
00180     for (i = numvert; i < elementList[index].connectivity.size(); ++i)
00181       --vertexList[elementList[index].connectivity[i]].midcount;
00182 
00183   elementList[index].topology = type;
00184   
00185   numvert = TopologyInfo::corners( elementList[index].topology );
00186   if (numvert) 
00187     for (i = numvert; i < elementList[index].connectivity.size(); ++i)
00188       ++vertexList[elementList[index].connectivity[i]].midcount;
00189 }

00257 
00258 void MeshImplData::reset_vertex( size_t index, 
00259                                  const Vector3D& coords,
00260                                  bool fixed, 
00261                                  MsqError& err )
00262 {
00263   if (index >= vertexList.size())
00264   {
00265     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid vertex handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00266     return;
00267   }
00268   
00269   Vertex& vert = vertexList[index];
00270   
00271   if (!vert.adjacencies.empty())
00272   {
00273     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot overwrite referenced vertex", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00274     return;
00275   }
00276   
00277   vert.coords = coords;
00278   vert.fixed = fixed;
00279   vert.valid = true;
00280 }

00282 void MeshImplData::reset_element( size_t index,
00283                                   const std::vector<long>& vertices,
00284                                   EntityTopology topology,
00285                                   MsqError& err )
00286 {
00287   clear_element( index, err );                   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00288   set_element( index, vertices, topology, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00289 }

00291 void MeshImplData::reset_element( size_t index,

00299 
00300 
00301 void MeshImplData::clear_element( size_t index, MsqError& err )
00302 {  
00303   if (index >= elementList.size())
00304   {
00305     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00306     return;
00307   }
00308   
00309   unsigned numvert = TopologyInfo::corners( elementList[index].topology );
00310   if (numvert) 
00311     for (unsigned i = numvert; i < elementList[index].connectivity.size(); ++i)
00312       --vertexList[elementList[index].connectivity[i]].midcount;
00313 
00314   std::vector<size_t>& conn = elementList[index].connectivity;
00315   for (std::vector<size_t>::iterator iter = conn.begin();
00316        iter != conn.end(); ++iter)
00317   {
00318     std::vector<size_t>& adj = vertexList[*iter].adjacencies;
00319     for (std::vector<size_t>::iterator iter2 = adj.begin();
00320          iter2 != adj.end(); ++iter2)
00321     {
00322       if (*iter2 == index)
00323       {
00324         adj.erase(iter2);
00325         break;
00326       }
00327     }
00328   }
00329   conn.clear();
00330 }
00331 
00332 void MeshImplData::set_element( size_t index,
00333                                 const std::vector<long>& vertices,
00334                                 EntityTopology topology,
00335                                 MsqError& err )
00336 {
00337   if (sizeof(long) == sizeof(size_t)) 
00338     set_element( index, *reinterpret_cast<const std::vector<size_t>*>(&vertices), topology, err );
00339   else {
00340     std::vector<size_t> conn(vertices.size());
00341     std::copy( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), conn.begin() );
00342     set_element( index, conn, topology, err );
00343   }
00344 }
00345 
00346 void MeshImplData::set_element( size_t index,
00347                                 const std::vector<size_t>& vertices,
00348                                 EntityTopology topology,
00349                                 MsqError& err )
00350 {
00351   if (index >= elementList.size())
00352   {
00353     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00354     return;
00355   }
00356 
00357   elementList[index].connectivity = vertices;
00358   elementList[index].topology = topology;
00359   
00360   for (std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator iter = vertices.begin();
00361        iter != vertices.end(); ++iter)
00362   {
00363     if (!is_vertex_valid( *iter ))
00364     {
00365       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid vertex handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00366       return;
00367     }
00368     
00369     std::vector<size_t>& adj = vertexList[*iter].adjacencies;
00370     for (std::vector<size_t>::iterator iter2 = adj.begin();
00371          iter2 != adj.end(); ++iter2)
00372       if (*iter2 == index)
00373         return;
00374     
00375     adj.push_back( index );
00376   }
00377   
00378   unsigned numvert = TopologyInfo::corners( elementList[index].topology );
00379   if (numvert) 
00380     for (unsigned i = numvert; i < elementList[index].connectivity.size(); ++i)
00381       ++vertexList[elementList[index].connectivity[i]].midcount;
00382 }
00383 
00384 size_t MeshImplData::add_vertex( const Vector3D& coords, bool fixed, MsqError& err )
00385 {
00386   size_t index;
00387   
00388   if (!deletedVertexList.empty())
00389   {
00390     index = deletedVertexList[deletedVertexList.size()-1];
00391     deletedVertexList.pop_back();
00392     reset_vertex( index, coords, fixed, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00393   }
00394   else
00395   {
00396     index = vertexList.size();
00397     vertexList.push_back( Vertex(coords, fixed ) );
00398   }
00399   
00400   return index;
00401 }
00402 
00403 size_t MeshImplData::add_element( const std::vector<long>& vertices,
00404                                   EntityTopology topology,
00405                                   MsqError& err )
00406 {
00407   size_t index;
00408   if (!deletedElementList.empty())
00409   {
00410     index = deletedElementList[deletedElementList.size()-1];
00411     deletedElementList.pop_back();
00412   }
00413   else
00414   {
00415     index = elementList.size();
00416     elementList.resize( elementList.size() + 1 );
00417   }
00418 
00419   set_element( index, vertices, topology, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00420   return index;
00421 }
00422 
00423 size_t MeshImplData::add_element( const std::vector<size_t>& vertices,
00424                                   EntityTopology topology,
00425                                   MsqError& err )
00426 {
00427   size_t index;
00428   if (!deletedElementList.empty())
00429   {
00430     index = deletedElementList[deletedElementList.size()-1];
00431     deletedElementList.pop_back();
00432   }
00433   else
00434   {
00435     index = elementList.size();
00436     elementList.resize( elementList.size() + 1 );
00437   }
00438 
00439   set_element( index, vertices, topology, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00440   return index;
00441 }

00443 void MeshImplData::delete_vertex( size_t index, MsqError& err )
00444 {
00445   if (!is_vertex_valid( index ))
00446   {
00447     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid vertex handle", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00448     return;
00449   }
00450   
00451   vertexList[index].valid = false;
00452   deletedVertexList.push_back( index );
00453 }
00454 
00455 void MeshImplData::delete_element( size_t index, MsqError& err )
00456 {
00457   clear_element( index, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00458   deletedElementList.push_back( index );
00459 }
00460 
00461 void MeshImplData::copy_mesh( size_t* vertex_handle_array,
00462                               size_t* element_handle_array,
00463                               size_t* element_conn_offsets,
00464                               size_t* element_conn_indices )
00465 {
00466   std::vector<size_t> vertex_map( vertexList.size() );
00467   size_t vh_index = 0;
00468   for (size_t v = 0; v < vertexList.size(); ++v)
00469   {
00470     if (vertexList[v].valid
00471 #ifdef SEPARATE_MID_NODES
00472         && vertexList[v].midcount < vertexList[v].adjacencies.size()
00473 #endif
00474        )
00475     {
00476       vertex_handle_array[vh_index] = v;
00477       vertex_map[v] = vh_index;
00478       ++vh_index;
00479     }
00480     else
00481     {
00482       vertex_map[v] = vertexList.size();
00483     }
00484   }
00485   
00486   size_t offset = 0;
00487   for (size_t e = 0; e < elementList.size(); ++e)
00488   {
00489     Element& elem = elementList[e];
00490     size_t cl;
00491 #ifdef SEPARATE_MID_NODES
00492     cl = TopologyInfo::corners( elem.topology );
00493     if (!cl)
00494 #endif
00495       cl = elem.connectivity.size();
00496     if (cl)
00497     {
00498       *element_handle_array = e;
00499       ++element_handle_array;
00500       
00501       *element_conn_offsets = offset;
00502       ++element_conn_offsets;
00503       offset += cl;
00504     
00505       std::vector<size_t>::iterator conn = elem.connectivity.begin();
00506       std::vector<size_t>::iterator end = conn + cl;
00507       while (conn != end)
00508       {
00509         *element_conn_indices = vertex_map[*conn];
00510         ++element_conn_indices;
00511         ++conn;
00512       }
00513     }
00514   }
00515   *element_conn_offsets = offset;
00516 }
00517 
00518 void MeshImplData::copy_higher_order( std::vector<size_t>& mid_nodes,
00519                                       std::vector<size_t>& vertices,
00520                                       std::vector<size_t>& vertex_indices,
00521                                       std::vector<size_t>& index_offsets,
00522                                       MsqError& err )
00523 {
00524   mid_nodes.clear();
00525   vertices.clear();
00526   vertex_indices.clear();
00527   index_offsets.clear();
00528  
00529     // Create a map of from vertex handle to index in "vertices"
00530     // Use vertexList.size() to mean uninitialized.
00531   size_t v;
00532   std::vector<size_t> vert_map( vertexList.size() );
00533   for (v = 0; v < vertexList.size(); ++v)
00534     vert_map[v] = vertexList.size();
00535 
00536     // Loop over all mid-side vertices
00537   for (v = 0; v < vertexList.size(); ++v)
00538   {
00539     const Vertex& vert = vertexList[v];
00540     
00541       // Not a mid-side vertex, skip it
00542     if (!vert.valid || !vert.midcount)
00543       continue;
00544       
00545       // Populate "verts" with the handles of all adjacent corner vertices
00546     assert( vert.adjacencies.size() ); // shouldn't be able to fail if vert.midcount > 0
00547     int elem_indx = vert.adjacencies[0];
00548     Element& elem = elementList[elem_indx];
00549     
00550       // Find index of node in elem's connectivity list
00551     unsigned index;
00552     for (index = 0; index < elem.connectivity.size(); ++index)
00553       if (elem.connectivity[index] == v)
00554         break;
00555     if (index == elem.connectivity.size())
00556     {
00557       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Inconsistent data.", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00558       return;
00559     }
00560 
00561       // Given the index in the element's connectivity list,
00562       // get the side of the element containing the mid-node.
00563     unsigned side_dim, side_num;
00564     TopologyInfo::side_number( elem.topology, elem.connectivity.size(),
00565                           index, side_dim, side_num, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00566 
00567     if (!side_dim) // Not a mid-side node
00568     {
00569       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_STATE,"Improperly connected mesh.");
00570       return;
00571     }
00572 
00573       // Get the adjacent corner vertices from the element side.
00574     unsigned num_corners;
00575     const unsigned* corner_indices = TopologyInfo::side_vertices( 
00576       elem.topology, side_dim, side_num, num_corners, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00577 
00578       // Add the mid-side node to the output list
00579     mid_nodes.push_back( v );
00580       // Store offset at which the indices of the corner
00581       // vertices adjacent to this mid-side node will be 
00582       // stored in "vertex_indices".
00583     index_offsets.push_back( vertex_indices.size() );
00584       // For each adjacent corner vertex, if the vertex is not
00585       // already in "vertices" add it, and add the index to
00586       // the adjacency list for this mid-side node.
00587     for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_corners; ++i)
00588     {
00589       size_t vert_idx = elem.connectivity[corner_indices[i]];
00590       assert( is_vertex_valid(vert_idx) );
00591       
00592       if (vert_map[vert_idx] == vertexList.size())
00593       {
00594         vert_map[vert_idx] = vertices.size();
00595         vertices.push_back( vert_idx );
00596       }
00597       vertex_indices.push_back( vert_map[vert_idx] );
00598     }
00599   }
00600   index_offsets.push_back( vertex_indices.size() );
00601 }
00602 
00603 bool MeshImplData::is_mid_node( size_t index ) const
00604 {
00605   return is_vertex_valid(index) && vertexList[index].midcount > 0;
00606 }
00607 
00608 bool MeshImplData::is_corner_node( size_t index ) const
00609 {
00610   return is_vertex_valid(index) && vertexList[index].midcount < vertexList[index].adjacencies.size();
00611 }

00614 
00615 void MeshImplData::all_vertices( std::vector<size_t>& list, MsqError& ) const
00616 {
00617   list.clear();
00618   for (size_t idx = 0; idx < vertexList.size(); ++idx)
00619     if (vertexList[idx].valid)
00620       list.push_back( idx );
00621 }
00622 
00623 void MeshImplData::all_elements( std::vector<size_t>& list, MsqError& err ) const
00624 {
00625   list.clear();
00626   for (size_t idx = 0; idx < elementList.size(); ++idx)
00627     if (!elementList[idx].connectivity.empty())
00628       list.push_back( idx );
00629 }
00630 
00631 void MeshImplData::get_adjacent_elements( 
00632                         std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator node_iter,
00633                         std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator node_end,
00634                         std::vector<size_t>& elems, MsqError& err )
00635 {
00636   if (node_iter == node_end || !is_vertex_valid( *node_iter ))
00637   {
00638     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00639     return;
00640   }
00641   
00642     // Get list of elements adjacent to first node
00643   elems = vertexList[*node_iter].adjacencies;
00644   
00645     // For each aditional node, intersect elems with elements adjacent to node
00646   for (++node_iter; node_iter != node_end; ++node_iter)
00647   {
00648     std::vector<size_t>::iterator elem_iter = elems.begin();
00649     while (elem_iter != elems.end())
00650     {
00651       std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator adj_iter = vertexList[*node_iter].adjacencies.begin();
00652       const std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator adj_end = vertexList[*node_iter].adjacencies.end();
00653       for (; adj_iter != adj_end; ++adj_iter)
00654         if (*elem_iter == *adj_iter)
00655           break;
00656       
00657       if (adj_iter == adj_end)
00658       {
00659         *elem_iter = elems[elems.size()-1];
00660         elems.pop_back();
00661       }
00662       else
00663       {
00664         ++elem_iter;
00665       }
00666     }
00667   }
00668 }
00669 
00670 bool MeshImplData::has_adjacent_elements( 
00671                         size_t elem,
00672                         const std::vector<size_t>& nodes,
00673                         MsqError& err )
00674 {
00675   std::vector<size_t> adj_elems;
00676   const unsigned dim = TopologyInfo::dimension( elementList[elem].topology );
00677   get_adjacent_elements( nodes.begin(), nodes.end(), adj_elems, err );
00678   
00679   std::vector<size_t>::iterator iter;
00680   for (iter = adj_elems.begin(); iter != adj_elems.end(); ++iter)
00681     if (*iter != elem && 
00682         TopologyInfo::dimension( elementList[*iter].topology ) == dim )
00683       break;
00684 
00685   return iter != adj_elems.end();
00686 }                 
00687 
00688 void MeshImplData::skin( std::vector<size_t>& sides, MsqError& err ) 
00689 {
00690   std::vector<size_t> side_nodes;
00691   
00692     // For each element in mesh
00693   for (size_t elem = 0; elem < elementList.size(); ++elem)
00694   {
00695     if (!is_element_valid(elem))
00696       continue;
00697     
00698       // For each side of the element, check if there
00699       // are any adjacent elements.
00700     const EntityTopology topo = elementList[elem].topology;
00701     std::vector<size_t>& conn = elementList[elem].connectivity;
00702     switch (topo)
00703     {
00704         // For normal elements (not poly****)
00705       default:
00706       {
00707         unsigned num = TopologyInfo::sides( topo );
00708         unsigned dim = TopologyInfo::dimension( topo ) - 1;
00709           // For each side
00710         for (unsigned side = 0; side < num; ++side)
00711         {
00712             // Get list of vertices defining the side
00713           unsigned count;
00714           const unsigned* indices = TopologyInfo::side_vertices( topo, dim, side, count, err );
00715           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00716           side_nodes.clear();
00717           for (unsigned k = 0; k < count; ++k)
00718             side_nodes.push_back( conn[indices[k]] );
00719           
00720             // If no adjacent element, add side to output list
00721           bool adj = has_adjacent_elements( elem, side_nodes, err );
00722           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00723           if ( !adj )
00724           {
00725             sides.push_back( elem );
00726             sides.push_back( side );
00727           }
00728         }
00729       }
00730       break;
00731       
00732       case POLYGON:
00733       {
00734         for (unsigned side = 0, next = 1; next < conn.size(); ++side, ++next)
00735         {
00736           side_nodes.clear();
00737           side_nodes.push_back( conn[side] );
00738           side_nodes.push_back( conn[next] );
00739           
00740             // If no adjacent element, add side to output list
00741           bool adj = has_adjacent_elements( elem, side_nodes, err );
00742           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00743           if ( !adj )
00744           {
00745             sides.push_back( elem );
00746             sides.push_back( side );
00747           }
00748         }
00749       }
00750       break;
00751       
00752       case POLYHEDRON:
00753       {
00754         for (unsigned side = 0; side < conn.size(); ++side)
00755         {
00756           side_nodes = elementList[conn[side]].connectivity;
00757           
00758             // If no adjacent element, add side to output list
00759           bool adj = has_adjacent_elements( elem, side_nodes, err );
00760           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00761           if ( !adj )
00762           {
00763             sides.push_back( elem );
00764             sides.push_back( side );
00765           }
00766         }
00767       }
00768       break;
00769     } // switch(topo)
00770   } // for (elementList)
00771 }          
00772 
00773 
00774 MeshImplVertIter::~MeshImplVertIter()
00775   {}
00776 
00777 void MeshImplVertIter::restart()
00778 {
00779   index = 0;
00780   if (!mesh->is_vertex_valid( index ))
00781     operator++();
00782 }
00783 
00784 void MeshImplVertIter::operator++()
00785 {
00786   ++index;
00787   while (index < mesh->max_vertex_index() && 
00788          (!mesh->is_vertex_valid(index) ||
00789           !mesh->is_corner_node(index)))
00790     ++index;
00791 }
00792 
00793 Mesh::VertexHandle MeshImplVertIter::operator*() const
00794 {
00795   return reinterpret_cast<Mesh::VertexHandle>(index);
00796 }
00797 
00798 bool MeshImplVertIter::is_at_end() const
00799 { 
00800   return index >= mesh->max_vertex_index();
00801 }
00802 
00803 
00804 
00805 MeshImplElemIter::~MeshImplElemIter()
00806   {}
00807 
00808 void MeshImplElemIter::restart()
00809 {
00810   index = 0;
00811   if (!mesh->is_element_valid( index ))
00812     operator++();
00813 }
00814 
00815 void MeshImplElemIter::operator++()
00816 {
00817   ++index;
00818   while (index < mesh->max_element_index() && !mesh->is_element_valid(index))
00819     ++index;
00820 }
00821 
00822 Mesh::ElementHandle MeshImplElemIter::operator*() const
00823 {
00824   return reinterpret_cast<Mesh::ElementHandle>(index);
00825 }
00826 
00827 bool MeshImplElemIter::is_at_end() const
00828 { 
00829   return index >= mesh->max_element_index();
00830 }
